itemcraftdesc-tap: A specialized tool used for gathering resin from trees more quickly
itemdesc-tap: A specialized tool used for gathering resin from trees more quickly. Combined with a wooden bucket to craft a Tree Tapping Kit. Can only be made using copper.
blockdesc-treetapper-empty-north: Set up this kit on a section of tree that is leaking Resin to gather it more quickly. Once placed, check back often to collect the resin.
game:placefailure-blockalreadyattached: Can't place more than one on this block
setting-third-resin-quantity-comment: Amount of resin harvested from a 1/3 full tree tapper
setting-twothird-resin-quantity-comment: Amount of resin harvested from a 2/3 full tree tapper
setting-full-resin-quantity-comment: Amount of resin harvested from a full tree tapper
setting-empty-to-third-hours-comment: In-game hours for an empty tree tapper to become 1/3 full
setting-third-to-twothird-hours-comment: In-game hours for a 1/3 full tree tapper to become 2/3 full
setting-twothird-to-full-hours-comment: In-game hours for a 2/3 full tree tapper to become full
